Class ECCurveFp

java.lang.Object

      com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc.ECCurveFp
public final class ECCurveFp
extends ECCurve

This ECCurveFp class implements elliptic curve over prime fields:
y^2 == x^3 + a*x + b
